sentence.Network_en: A pedunculate barnacle is attached to the substrate by a fleshy foot or stalk.
sentence.Network_cn: 有肉茎的藤壶通过肉足或肉茎附着在基质上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2010年4月29日 -  The disease affects the UK's two native species of oak - sessile(无柄的,固着的) and pedunculate(有梗的) . To date, there have been.
Inflorescence cymose , axillary , sessile or pedunculate , primary axis often a tendril , secondary axis often reduced ;, 花序聚伞状 , 腋生 , 无柄或有花序梗 , 主轴通常卷须 , 次级轴通常退化;
Leaves opposite . Corymbs short pedunculate or sessile , axillary , often fascicled., 叶对生伞房花序短的有花序梗或者无柄 , 腋生 , 经常是簇生.
